turns.content: How would you translate "灯泡" into english?
The word "灯泡" in English can be translated as "light bulb."

I apologize for misunderstanding your previous question. In colloquial Chinese, "灯泡" can also be used to describe a third-wheel, or someone who is an unwanted or unnecessary companion to a couple or group. In English, the equivalent phrase would be a "third wheel" or a "gooseberry." So, if someone says "他是我们的灯泡", the English translation would be "He's our third wheel" or "He's the gooseberry."
